Source.Name: ffmpegthumbs-mattepaint
Source.Summary: The ffmpegthumbs-mattepaint is an alternative version of the standard KDE ffmpegthumbs.
Source.Description: The ffmpegthumbs-mattepaint is an alternative version of the standard KDE ffmpegthumbs.Both the ffmpegthubs and the ffmpefthumbs-mattpaint can be installed side by side.
